Brandon Crone
Brian Ligon |StadiumArena=[[Hinkle Fieldhouse]] |Champion=NIT 8 Seed (Cincinnati) |BowlTourney=First Round vs. Florida St. |BowlTourneyResult=L 67â63 }} {{2005-06 Horizon League men's basketball standings}} The '''2005â06 Butler Bulldogs men's basketball team''' represented the [[Butler Bulldogs men's basketball]] team in the [[2005â06 NCAA Division I men's basketball season]]. Their head coach was [[Todd Lickliter]], serving his 5th year. The Bulldogs played their home games at [[Hinkle Fieldhouse]]. The Bulldogs earned an at-large bid to the [[2006 National Invitation Tournament]], earning an 8 seed in the Cincinnati bracket. They beat 7 seed [[Miami Redhawks men's basketball|Miami (OH)]] 53â42 in the opening round before falling to 2 seed [[Florida State Seminoles men's basketball|Florida St.]] 67â63 in the first
